fields.summary: MapOutputTrackerMaster.shufflestatuses is mistakenly cleaned by Shuffle cleanup
fields.description: MapOutputTrackerMaster.shufflestatuses can be mistakenly cleaned by Shuffle Cleanup feature, leading to SparkException (crashing the SparkContext) by the subsequent access to that already removed shuffle metadata. A real case (limited to local cluster currently) is the ongoing subquery could access the shuffle metadata which has been already cleanedup after the main query completes. See the detailed discussion at: [https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/52213#discussion_r2415632474].

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
